Class DataController

java.lang.Object
com.example.moviepopularitybackend.controller.DataController
@RestController public class DataController extends Object
The DataController class handles API requests related to combining movie and population data, as well as managing user preferences. It acts as a REST controller that provides endpoints for accessing and manipulating the combined data and user preferences.

  • Method Details

    • getCombinedData

      @GetMapping("/combinedData") public TreeMap<Integer,CombinedDataByYear> getCombinedData(@RequestParam String country, @RequestParam String genre, @RequestParam int startYear, @RequestParam int endYear, @RequestParam String indicator)
      Fetches combined data for movies and population statistics based on the provided parameters such as country, genre, start year, end year, and indicator.
      Parameters:
      country - The name of the country for which to fetch data.
      genre - The genre of the movies for which to fetch data.
      startYear - The starting year of the data range.
      endYear - The ending year of the data range.
      indicator - The population indicator for which to fetch data.
      Returns:
      A TreeMap with the combined data by year, where the key is the year and the value is the combined movie and population statistics for that year.

    • savePreferences

      @PostMapping("/api/preferences") public Map<String,String> savePreferences(@RequestBody UserPreferences preferences)
      Saves user preferences provided in the request body.
      Parameters:
      preferences - The UserPreferences object containing the user's settings.
      Returns:
      A map with the status of the save operation.

    • getPreferences

      @GetMapping("/api/preferences") public Set<UserPreferences> getPreferences()
      Fetches all saved user preferences.
      Returns:
      A set of UserPreferences objects representing all saved preferences.

    • deletePreferences

      @DeleteMapping("/api/preferences") public Map<String,String> deletePreferences(@RequestParam int index)
      Deletes a user preference based on the provided index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the preference to delete.
      Returns:
      A map indicating whether the deletion was successful or if the index was invalid.

    • getCodeMappings

      @GetMapping("/api/codeMappings") public Map<String,Map<String,String>> getCodeMappings()
